issue.title: [CF 1412] sweep animation not working
issue.body:
Neither sweep animation nor the timers work on my Disc priest for any group used.  Everything works perfectly for other specs/classes.

 

Any help would be appreciated.


> Posted by CurseForge user compact13 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1412 | Raw

comments.body:
Does it work with all other addons disabled?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
